content: this simple cozy cowl makes the most of fabulously dyed fingering weight yarn it is completely reversible and surprisingly easy to knit use gauge dyeworks blue light colourway which can be divided into two skeins for coordinated colour perfection or choose your own adventure with two colours of any fingering weight yarn size 60cm 24in circumference 35cm 14in tall gauge stitch gauge measured by the number of vertical ribs of v shaped knit stitches row gauge by the number of stacked knit v s measured after blocking with ribs slightly opened 10 5 ribs and 24 row per 10cm 4in knit in the round materials needed * gauge dyeworks yarns mcn fingering in blue light 370m/405yd 115g/4oz or 185m/200yd each of two coordinating fingering weight yarns * 1 stitch marker
